io.dropwizard.jersey.jackson

Class JacksonMessageBodyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.base.ProviderBase<com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJsonProvider,com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper,com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JsonEndpointConfig,com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JsonMapperConfigurator>
      • com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJsonProvider
        • com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJaxbJsonProvider
          • io.dropwizard.jersey.jackson.JacksonMessageBodyProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.core.Versioned, javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader<Object>, javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<Object>

    public class JacksonMessageBodyProvider
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJaxbJsonProvider
    A Jersey provider which enables using Jackson to parse request entities into objects and generate response entities from objects. Any request entity method parameters annotated with @Valid are validated, and an informative 422 Unprocessable Entity response is returned should the entity be invalid.

    (Essentially, extends JacksonJaxbJsonProvider with validation and support for JsonIgnoreType.)
